description:
Night Dreams EDP - 60ML, an enchanting fragrance that captures the essence of a mystical night. Indulge in the Night Dreams EDP experience, where every spray transports you to a realm of serenity and allure. This exquisite perfume is a must-have for any fragrance connoisseur.

Unveil the Magic of Night Dreams EDP

Immerse yourself in the Night Dreams EDP, a fragrance that balances elegance and mystery. With its delicate blend of notes, it is designed to captivate your senses and leave a lasting impression. 🌸💫

Product Info
Size 60ML
Gender Unisex
Product Type Eau de Parfum
Concentration 15-20%
Brand Night Dreams
Fragrance Notes
Top Bergamot, Lavender
Heart Jasmine, Rose
Base Sandalwood, Musk

Key Features:

  • Long-lasting aroma that evolves beautifully over time.
  • Perfect for both day and night wear. 🌿
  • Elegantly packaged, making it a perfect gift. 🎁

The Night Dreams brand has been renowned for crafting luxurious fragrances that are synonymous with sophistication. Founded by a collective of passionate perfumers, it has quickly become a favorite among fragrance enthusiasts worldwide. Explore other enchanting scents in our best sellers collection.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does the scent of Night Dreams EDP last?
The Night Dreams EDP is crafted with premium ingredients, ensuring a long-lasting fragrance that can linger for up to 8-10 hours, making it perfect for all-day wear. 💎✨
